description:
Socket an Artifact's [slot_trait] Trait Slot with this item to gain this trait:\n\nMaster of Basilisks:
If all the creatures in your party are {RACE_Basilisk}s, they have a 20% chance to avoid damage. In addition, their innate traits have a 25% chance to activate even if they took damage between their turns. This trait does not stack.
name: Sigil of the Basilisk
